label: Organisation
comment: The Party class represents an entity such as an organization, or a company that manufactured the product.

datatypeProperties.comment: The industry categories for this organisations.  Recommend use of UNCPC as the category scheme.
The name of the organization or company, represented as a text string.
An optional lsit of other registered identifiers for this organisations
the country in which this organisation is registered

referencedBy.comment: The Party entity responsible for operating the facility.
The Party entity that manufactured the product.
